object.assignee: urn:uuid:{uuid of the student who completed the assignment}

generated.attempt: urn:uuid:{uuid is the same as object.id property, contained in this message}

data.edApp: {software app, including the platform (hmh1 | ed; https://www.hmhco.com/AggPA/one | https://www.hmhco.com/AggPA/ed)}

extensions.instructor: urn:uuid:{uuid of the instructor who created the assignment}
